channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: @PolarSpark @gigastacey We did indeed. Think it was on the podcast, but it might have been in the newsletter / news of the week.
item.source:markdown: @PolarSpark @gigastacey We did indeed. Think it was on the podcast, but it might have been in the newsletter / news of the week.
